alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 02 at 11:26AM CDT until August 02 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Flood Warning for Small Streams in... Fayette County in south central Illinois... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 1125 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms with heavy rain over the area. The rain will cause flooding. Up to three inches of rain has already fallen. An additional 1 to 2 inches is possible. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Vandalia, St. Elmo, Ramsey, Brownstown, Farina, Wrights Corner, Avena, La Clede, St. Peter, Loogootee, St. James, St. Paul and Bayle City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 63 and 76. Interstate 57 in Illinois near exit 135. This also includes Ramsey Lake State Park.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding of small creeks and streams, country roads, farmland, and other low lying spots.
